column2: Codexis, Inc. engages in the discovery, development, and sale of proteins. The company is headquartered in Redwood City, California and currently employs 132 full-time employees. The firm is engaged in the development of biocatalysts for the commercial manufacture of pharmaceuticals and fine chemicals. The firm operates through its two segments, such as the performance enzymes and novel biotherapeutics. The company provides enzyme optimization services from small scale through to commercial quantities and also develops biocatalyst products. The company is also engaged in the development of manufacturing processes for active pharmaceutical ingredients, fine chemicals and food ingredients. Its CodeEvolver is a protein engineering technology platform and products in the pharmaceuticals market. The firm serves various industries, including food and food ingredients, animal feed, flavors, fragrances, and agricultural chemical.
